homepage.philosophy.one.message: Beauty is better than ugliness, Explicit is better than implicit.

homepage.philosophy.two.message: Simple is better than complex,Complex is better than complicated.

homepage.philosophy.three.message: Flat is better than nested,Sparse is better than dense.

homepage.philosophy.five.message: Special cases aren't special enough to break the rules.Although practicality beats purity.

homepage.philosophy.six.message: Errors should never pass silently,Unless explicitly silenced.

homepage.philosophy.seven.message: In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.

homepage.philosophy.eight.message: There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.

homepage.philosophy.nine.message: Now is better than never,Although never is often better than right now.

homepage.philosophy.ten.message: If the implementation is hard to explain, it's a bad idea.

homepage.philosophy.eleven.message: If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea.
